conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a auto racing movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I'd highly recommend "Speed Racer" if you're looking for a fast-paced, action-packed auto racing movie. Melvil Poupaud, Richard Roundtree, and Susan Sarandon are just a few of the stars in this vibrant film about a young driver's quest to become champion with his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.

Another great option is "Days of Thunder" starring Tom Cruise and Robert Duvall. This movie offers an exciting glimpse into the world of stock car racing, following a young hot-shot driver as he competes at the top level.

If you prefer more contemporary movies, "Fast & Furious" offers high-octane stunts and an intriguing plot about friendship and loyalty. Enjoy the ride!

If you're looking for a different genre, "What Women Want" might also interest you. This comedy stars Mel Gibson as an advertising executive who gains the ability to hear women's thoughts, leading to some humorous and insightful situations. Enjoy the movies!
